performance_attributes.language_nuance: Pure Hindi with natural Delhi rhythm and colloquial 'Dilli' bite

masterpiece_script_segment.hindi: Dilli ki hawa mein na... ek ajeeb sa bhari-pan hai. Log kehte hain ye dhuaan hai. Main kehta hoon... ye un logon ki cheekhein hain jo mere raaste mein aaye thhe. Beta... raj-paat virasat mein milta hoga, lekin dabdaba... dabdaba kamana padta hai.
masterpiece_script_segment.performance_directive: Start with a deep intake of breath. Speak close to the mic. Treat words like 'DABDABA' with heavy chest resonance. End with a slow, commanding finality.
